text: Karim is the fastest growing technology
company in the middlee we've been
growing 10 times per year for the past
three years that's 1,000 times over the

very closely with AWS for my
introduction Karim is the leading car
booking service in the broader Middle
East we are operating in more than 40
cities in 11 countries from Morocco in
the West all the way to Pakistan release
and basically we allow customers to
easily book a car using their mobile
phone and a captain will show up in a
car and take you wherever you need to go
Karim has been enormous growth we have
been able to scale that fast partially
thanks to Amazon Web Services one small
issue machine and a small audio instance
running and then we've been growing
rapidly and that means that we have
expanded quite rapidly our usage of aw
we now have more than 500 instances

8th year services the backend
application it's all hosted on AWS
hundred-percent
we use AWS ec2 and lustig installed
services to host the API servers that
our applications

as make the booking and take the trip
these services in turn huge jobs to the
sphere service and then again the
workers that processable jobs are also
running
on ec2 and elastic beanstalk the

when it comes to building
Carine is that we should focus on the

and that means how can we get the car in

a car booking service in the Middle East

there's traffic there's poor data
connectivity there is poor GPS coverage
so knowing that at least our core
technology infrastructure is running
smoothly because it's on a double yes
